casebody.data:
STEWART
v.
KRUEGER, et al. No. 274P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Robert K. Stewart, Marion, for Stewart, Robert K. Amy Kunstling Irene, Assistant Attorney General. Maureen Krueger, District Attorney.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of August 2015 by Petitioner to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
